options.text: Selecting the option ABOVE will allow you to choose between an existing or new workspace for Azure Virtual Desktop. Selecting New will conifgure it in the same manner as the AVD Insights Configuration workbook. Often AVD Inisights is configured separately from the rest of the environment to allow for different retention periods and performance. Using a seperate Log Analytics Workspace is recommended. This deployment will then create the alerts targeted to the separate workspace.
